title: YelperMe
description: A Yelp API-powered app built to provide real-time restaurant and tourist spot suggestions with a ReactJS front-end and Python backend for secure and seamless data handling.

title: Skintel
description: A UX/UI design project where insights from surveys and interviews were applied to design a skincare app using Figma, focusing on intuitive UI and seamless user experience.

title: Go, Zot, Go!
description: A Google Maps-based commuter app built to recommend peer-voted routes and perform cost analysis for UCI students, utilizing custom polylines and API queries for optimized routing.
